articles.description: Cardiff looked much better at Stoke when Hudson made his second-half substitutions and need that adventurous approach from the start at home to Blackpool
articles.content:

articles.title: SWPL Cup final - Rangers 2-0 Hibernian: Glasgow side win trophy for first time - BBC
articles.description: Rangers roar to a first SWPL Cup success by defeating seven-time winners Hibernian at Tynecastle.
articles.content:
Lizzie Arnot rocketed an unstoppable finish into the top corner to open the scoring
Rangers roared to their first SWPL Cup success by defeating record holders Hibernian at Tynecastle.

articles.title: Ipswich Town 2 Peterborough 1 Grant McCann thoughts - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: Grant McCann was disappointed after his Peterborough side lost 2-1 to Ipswich Town in League One. This is what he had to say.
articles.content:
Frankie Kent had pulled Posh level ten minutes after falling behind in the first half to a Conor Chaplin goal.

articles.title: European Cross Country Championships: GB's Emile Cairess wins silver behind Jakob Ingebrigtsen - BBC
articles.description: Great Britain's Emile Cairess takes silver behind Olympic champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen at the European Cross Country Championships in Italy.
articles.content:
Norway's Jakob Ingebrigtsen (centre) won his second successive European cross country title

articles.author: Simon Mullock
articles.title: Luka Modric explains heartbreaking reason Croatia defy the odds at World Cups - The Mirror
articles.description: Croatia have been to six World Cups and reached the semi-final on three occasions, including being losing finalists in Russia four years ago, and will face Argentina in the last four in Qatar
articles.content:
Luka Modric believes that the Croatian fight for independence is driving them to take on the world.
 The 37-year-old Real Madrid midfielder is the heartbeat of a side that just refuses to be beaten.… [+2818 chars]
